name: Unstable Abel
description:
Description:

In this cute zombie survival game, you play as Abel.  

Abel is a bit unstable on his feet at the best of times. But given that he is being chased by an ever-growing horde of zombies... he is a little more unstable than usual.

Control Abel as he runs, dodges, jumps and tumbles through the landscape in front of him. Dodging around cars and ploughing through fences in order to escape certain doom. 

Each collision will cost him some energy, and ultimately make him even more unstable. How long can you survive the zombie horde?

Controls:

W,A,D to move.

Space to jump

Escape to close the game at any point
